name: NSM: Hiring: 2. ClickUp Hiring Pipeline Status Changed to "Request Trial" -> Send Email

hook.label: ClickUp Hiring Pipeline Status Changed to "Request Trial"

mapper.text:
Hi {{get(split(4.name; space); 1)}},

We really liked your portfolio and I'd love to have you put together a paid trial clip for us.

Below is a link to a form which explains the the trial, gives you a brief, and tells you how to upload the finished product. Remember to invoice us when you're done!

https://leftclick.typeform.com/video-editor#source=Upwork&loc={{4.custom_fields.Location}}&hourly_rate={{4.custom_fields.`Rate (USD)`}}&email={{4.custom_fields.Email}}&cu_id={{4.id}}

Appreciate your time and looking forward to seeing what you put together for us.

Cheers,
Nick
mapper.subject: Game to do a paid trial?

expect.name: addCustomFieldDateTime
expect.label: Include a Time in Custom Field Date Parameters
